00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import java.io.*;
00004 import java.util.Set;
00005 import java.util.logging.Logger;
00006 import liquibase.FileOpener;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.exception.SetupException;
00009 import liquibase.log.LogFactory;
00010 import liquibase.util.MD5Util;
00011 import liquibase.util.StreamUtil;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00026 public class SQLFileChange extends AbstractSQLChange {
00027     private static final Logger log = LogFactory.getLogger();
00028     private String file;
00029     private String encoding = null;
00030     
00031     
00032     public SQLFileChange() {
00033         super("sqlFile", "SQL From File");
00034     }
00035 
00036     public String getPath() {
00037         return file;
00038     }
00039 
00045     public void setPath(String fileName) {
00046         file = fileName;
00047     }
00048     
00053                 public String getEncoding()
00054                 {
00055                         return encoding;
00056                 }
00057 
00061                 public void setEncoding(String encoding)
00062                 {
00063                         this.encoding = encoding;
00064                 }
00065 
00066                 public void setUp() throws SetupException {
00067         if (file == null) {
00068             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile> - No path specified");
00069         }
00070         log.fine("SQLFile file:" + file);
00071         boolean loaded = loadFromClasspath(file);
00072         if(!loaded) {
00073             loaded = loadFromFileSystem(file);
00074         }
00075         
00076         if (!loaded) {
00077             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile path="+file+"> - Could not find file");
00078         }
00079         log.finer("SQLFile file contents is:" + getSql());
00080     }
00081 
00088     private boolean loadFromFileSystem(String file) throws SetupException {
00089 
00090         FileInputStream fis = null;
00091         try {
00092             fis = new FileInputStream(file);
00093             setSql( StreamUtil.getStreamContents(fis, encoding) );
00094             return true;
00095         } catch (FileNotFoundException fnfe) {
00096             return false;
00097         } catch (IOException e) {
00098             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile path="+file+"> -Unable to read file", e);
00099         } finally {
00100             if (fis != null) {
00101                 try {
00102                     fis.close();
00103                 } catch (IOException ioe) {//NOPMD
00104                     // safe to ignore
00105                 }
00106             }
00107         }
00108 
00109     }
00110 
00120     private boolean loadFromClasspath(String file) throws SetupException {
00121         InputStream in = null;
00122         try {
00123             FileOpener fo = getFileOpener();
00124             if(fo== null) {
00125                 return false;
00126             }
00127             
00128             in = fo.getResourceAsStream(file);
00129             if (in == null) {
00130                 return false;
00131             }
00132             setSql( StreamUtil.getStreamContents(in, encoding));
00133             return true;
00134         } catch (IOException ioe) {
00135             throw new SetupException("<sqlfile path="+file+"> -Unable to read file", ioe);
00136         } finally {
00137             if (in != null) {
00138                 try {
00139                     in.close();
00140                 } catch (IOException ioe) {//NOPMD
00141                     // safe to ignore
00142                 }
00143             }
00144         }
00145     }
00146     
00152     public String getMD5Sum() {
00153         return MD5Util.computeMD5(getSql());
00154     }
00155 
00156     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogDOM) {
00157         Element sqlElement = currentChangeLogDOM.createElement("sqlFile");
00158         sqlElement.setAttribute("path", file);
00159         if (encoding != null) {
00160                 sqlElement.setAttribute("encoding", encoding);
00161         }
00162         return sqlElement;
00163     }
00164 
00165     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00166         return "SQL in file " + file + " executed";
00167     }
00168 
00169 
00170     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00171         return null;
00172     }
